text: Jesse Williams spoke out against President Donald Trump ’ s remarks regarding National Football League players who choose to kneel in protest during the singing of the national anthem. The actor also questioned the necessity for pageantry in sports at all. During a speech in Alabama Friday to campaign for Sen. Luther Strange, Trump said people should boycott the NFL over protests like those demonstrated by former San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick, who took a knee during the national anthem before games last year to protest police brutality and racial injustices. “ Wouldn ’ t you love to see one of these NFL owners, when somebody disrespects our flag, to say, ‘ Get that son of a bitch off the field right now, he ’ s fired ’? ” Trump asked.
